extDesc.message: Save frequently-entered text for pasting later.

cmdDesc.message: Paste a clipping using its shortcut key

msgUnavail.message: The selected action is not available right now.

msgNoTextSel.message: No text was selected. Please select text first.

msgBrwsWndNotFocused.message: Please return to the browser window and try again.

msgClpgNotFound.message: Unable to find the selected clipping!

msgNoActvBrwsTab.message: Unable to paste clipping because there is no active browser tab.

msgRetryPgBusy.message: The page is currently busy. Wait for the page to finish, and then try again.

msgRetryPgNotLoaded.message: Unable to retrieve selected text. Reload the page, and then try again.

msgUnknown.message: No help is available (so leave me alone).
